translations.en_us: Pumpkin is a herbal plant. Pumpkin has been growing in the Oaxaca Valley for at least 8 thousand years. Already before the advent of our era, such a plant spread in North America in the valleys of the Mississippi and Missouri rivers.
translations.ru_ru: Тыква - это травяное растение. Тыква произрастает в Оахакской долине не меньше 8 тысяч лет. Уже до наступления нашей эры такое растение распространилось в Северной Америке в долинах рек Миссисипи и Миссури.

description.default: Pumpkin is a herbal plant. Pumpkin has been growing in the Oaxaca Valley for at least 8 thousand years. Already before the advent of our era, such a plant spread in North America in the valleys of the Mississippi and Missouri rivers.
